abstract: A ripple effect results in a new barber for Seville.
snippet: A ripple effect results in a new barber for Seville.
lead_paragraph: The Metropolitan Opera on Wednesday gave an update on who will fill in for Mariusz Kwiecien in the title role of "Don Giovanni." Mr. Kwiecien had to withdraw because of a back injury that led to surgery. Peter Mattei, who is replacing him on opening night on Thursday, will also step in for the performances of Oct. 17 and Oct. 22. Substitutes for Oct. 25 and Oct. 29 were not announced.

headline.main: Who's on First? Met Opera Announces Changes After Injury to 'Don Giovanni' Star
